name: Netflix-Clone
desc: In this project, we'll create a Netflix clone using React.js, React Hooks, and Redux Toolkit. This clone will mimic some of the core functionalities of the Netflix platform, such as displaying a list of movies and viewing movie details. Redux Toolkit will be used for state management to efficiently manage.
